Ingredients: 40 gms singhare ka atta (water chestnut flour)
Main Title: How to Make Ajwaini Paneer Kofta Curry

Prepare kofta:.step_text: Mash the cottage cheese and add singare ka atta and senda namak.
Make roundels and fry in oil.

Prepare gravy:.step_text: Remove the eye ,then boil the tomatoes ,make puree and stain.
In a pan heat oil and add ajwain and sauté for a minute. Then add the stained tomato puree and cook for 5 minutes.
Add the deggi mirch and sendha namak .
Then add fried kofta in the gravy and serve hot garnished with coriander.
